summary.body: I've just returned home and learned from a neighbour that there have been enquiries from police going house to house in the block about a theft?  Any information on that please?  Anything to do with the dogs being deployed around here late last night?  I realise that if there is an investigation under way right now, you may not be able to reply. Thanks Barbie.
summary.subject: Trouble in Andrewes?

summary.body: Does anyone know what's happened to the Anthony Gormley statue "Resolution" that was placed on the pavement near Shoe Lane library in october last year? I hesitate to say it's been stolen, but the fact that it's gone and its feet are still present, hacked off by the ankle indicate that it might have been. this link shows it in situ   (copy and paste link into browser address line if it's not clickable)
summary.subject: Anthony Gormley Statue Gone from Shoe Lane

summary.body: I wonder if the Police can cast any light on the mystery highlighted on the main discussion pages about statue which has 'gone walk abouts'?
summary.subject: Missing Gormley Statue ifrom Shoe Lane
